forum.content:
(If you don’t know who this person is, it means that you didn’t believe what I was saying at all.)
Are you happy? When I was leaving you, what are you thinking? Bad guy?beach?Or other....？Do you feel sad?yes...or maybe not!But at the moment you did not return my message, I found out that in fact, you also want to leave me.....I smiled, cried, and gave up...It turns out that you are playing a game called love...Just now the game is over..You will find other playmates..I'm not your special ... Anyway, I really love you more than you love me......!But we are far from far..There is too much temptation on your side...I miss you all the time.But...you not that..I want to talk to you on the phone. Even if I don't understand it, I still want to hear you, but you refuse..I want a real hug instead of just saying....sorry....i'm not good ....too bad....but instead of worrying every day that we don’t have a future, you suddenly disappear and I’m replaced by others... Even if I love you so much... I still have to let you go free!

Without mutual trust, how do you come to the end together?
forum.title: A paragraph for my lover:
